file_content.text: Maybe I'll take a break. Just one more hour.
Get to my lab station and bring those glands to Private Lorul!
Get several venom glands, we need a big sample size.
Sorry, I need to bring everyone some water, just as soon as I've changed Ensign Rachari's bandages.
If you weren't bitten and poisoned, please go. I have to save as many as I can.
Remember to conserve your energy.
Take care of yourself, too.
Thank you, Master Jedi, but I'll be... wait, maybe you could help?
So many people depending on you must be a heavy burden.
You have my sympathies.
I have to be strong for them. Wait... Master Jedi, maybe there's something you can do.
They're lucky to have someone so dedicated watching out for them.
You're doing a good job.
Thanks, I--wait, you're Havoc Squad? Sir, you could really help me out.
Best of luck.
Thanks. Unless... look, if you're handy with a blaster, I could really use your help.
They've been poisoned?
They're dying! All of them, and I can't... I'm sorry.
I'll go where I like.
Then at least make yourself useful.
The Empire provoked several poisonous creatures from the Belsavis jungle to attack us. If you're bitten, it can take days to die.
I'm developing an anti-venom, but I need venom gland samples from those... things, and I can't get close. If I die, who'll help my patients?
Don't worry, I'll handle it.
Don't worry, I can help.
Don't worry, I can help.
And what if I'm bitten?
Kill them fast and don't leave any skin exposed, that's all I can suggest until I have an anti-venom.
My notes and the preliminary anti-venom are at my lab station--you'll need to get the samples there while I keep these people alive.
Once you have the venom glands, talk to my assistant, Private Lorul. Please, hurry--and be careful.
Forget it. [Refuse quest]
Then please, just let me work!
Sorry, I mustn't be distracted; there's no one else to help these people.
